text: No pornography, gore or graphic violence.
No racism, sexism, discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
No xenophobia, nationalism, casteism, or fascism; no sympathizing with or advocating for these things.
No stalking or harassment. In general, if someone asks you to stop interacting with them, then stop.
No posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information ("doxing").
No impersonation of other people, brands, etc, even for the purposes of parody. Be your whole, authentic self.
No xenophobia, casteism, or fascism; no sympathizing with or advocating for these things.

hint: Do not engage in harmful behavior towards others, including harassment, discrimination, hate speech, or inciting violence.
Do not impersonate brands/companies, organizations, or other people.
Do not engage in casteism, homophobia, racism, sexism, transphobia, or xenophobia.
Do not incite violence against others or advocate violent ideologies.
Do not post advertising or engage in excessive self-promotion of your brand or business.
Do not post sexually explicit or graphic violent content.
Do not post content to deliberately deceive or mislead others.
Do not post or view CSAM including CG-CSAM or lolicon.
Do not post media showing blood, dead bodies, excessive violence, or open wounds.
Do not impersonate brands/companies, organizations, or other people.
Do not post sexually explicit or graphic violent content.
